meanings.definition: People who work on a farm.
meanings.sent1: Farmworkers harvest crops in the fields.
meanings.sent2: The farmworkers milked the cows every morning.
meanings.sent3: The farmworkers had a race to see who could pick the most apples.
meanings.sent4: The farmworkers are the backbone of agricultural production.
meanings.sent5: The farmworkers toil under the sun to ensure a bountiful harvest.

meanings.definition: The group of individuals employed to work on a farm.
meanings.sent1: The farmworkers gathered in the barn for a meeting.
meanings.sent2: Farmworkers from different countries come together to work on this farm.
meanings.sent3: The farmworkers organized a potluck to celebrate a successful season.
meanings.sent4: The farmworkers form a close-knit community in the rural area.
meanings.sent5: The farmworkers received recognition for their hard work and dedication.
